channel.title: Necroits Empires
channel.description:
[center][img]http://necroits.info/data/storage/attachments/f9697feaa65c3abb04f0c1e1eae38f28.jpg[/img][/center]
Traveler: You dont have much powers, just the basics. Its suggested to pick a path using the command +> /hero paths <+
Then follow the on screen instructions.
PATHS <+>
Knight: A Powerful melee path. All skills increase your defense, and attack power.
Mage: A knowledgeable one of the powerful arts. Able to shoot fireballs and strike things with lightning, you are a force to fear.
Hunter: Did they see you, or were you a figment of their imagination. Silent and stealthy, you kill your targets without them knowing.
Druid: One that loves gaia, you are able to grow trees, breath under water, an use animals to support you.
+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
Shops/showcase
You are able to make shops to sell items and here's how. 1: Get a half block. 2: Place half block. 3: Hold desired item in hand to sell. 4: Crouch and right click the half block. 5: Type Finite 6: Type price per item. 7: Enter the amount you want to stock. (Must have in inventory)
To refill just right click block.
To buy just hit the block and type how many u want to buy.
To remove shop right click the slab.
-note you do not have to type "/" before the command. Just type the command EX: DONT: (/finite) DO: (finite)

item.title: Necroits Empires
item.dc:creator: @NizuraInaka NizuraInaka
item.description:
@NizuraInaka wrote:

You fail to listen and understand.
I repeat, when I ban… I IP ban.
This means in order for you to log back in the server… you need a new IP, unless ur a hacker or ask your ISP for a new IP or get a new computer, or modem.

So it wasnt me. The only other OP i have, DOESNT ban unless she ask me. I didnt tell her to do it that way, she decides to ask me for permission to do stuff like banning people.

And your IGN is Herobrine? Is it Notch, and Honeydew as well? Any server admin should know that they should ban “Herobrine” “Notch” “Honeydew” “Player” and " ".

I have plenty of players who multi accounts, cracked clients, bought clients who play. And out of ALL of them you were specially chosen to by mysteriously banned? Since my server went up, over 1000 people has played.

If your IP is “3” in which its supposedly said to be over Hat trix… why didnt you think to go to another server, or make up another name. Guess your IQ points is in your ass instead of your head. As an admin of a server for 3-4 months… who started the server off of hamachi run by his laptop, who upgraded to an official server, have never heard of crap like this. And i went through quite a bit of OP’s and griefers. The server was always offline mode so cracked clients can play. I myself started off with a cracked client and when testing stuff use random names.

This argument is over. Go find another server.

Read full topic

item.title: Necroits Empires
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

I dont understand what you are saying. Or maybe i do. If I, the only one who has access to the IP's, who writes down all ip's that he bans along with the IGN in a book, doesnt remember this, and by "doesnt remember this" i mean "knows this didnt happen", then it didnt happen. I conclude that either A: he is either using the same computer of the person who got banned
I bought my own computer years ago, no one has used it but me.
B: a person who actually got banned and is just trollin the forum.
As I have said before, I logged on and was banned for no reason. Trolling is my night job.
C: a person who never even logged on the server.
I told you this like 5 times now, when will you decide to listen? I logged INTO the GAME and was BANNED. NO REASON AT ALL.
Because if his IP was banned... how can he ask the admin what happened if he wasnt IN GAME.
I'm not sure if I told you this, although since you obviously don't like listening to me and don't like accepting that your wrong, I logged INTO the GAME and was BANNED. So I made a new account.
If if for some reason the he somehow talked to an "ADMIN who later claim that he wasnt staff"... that means that a normal player said he was an ADMIN which he never really was.
Still doesn't prove why I was wrongly punished.
That's not my or the staff fault that someone else lied.
^I don't get it, you really love ignoring me don't you?

But it is your fault you pick shitty staff.

But he doesnt say he was IP banned, he was regular banned. So even if... His name was probably inappropriate and a staff member actually did ban the name.
I never used a inappropriate name, I have better things to do than to change my name to "yousuckbigdicks" or whatever your definition of 'inappropriate' is.
Either way... being banned means that you did something that deserved the result of you being expelled permanently from the server. That isnt us being abusive.
Getting tired of saying this, seriously, you need to learn to listen. Didn't you ever go to first grade and learn how to listen, and follow directions? I logged in, didn't say anything, didn't do anything, about 30 seconds later I was banned.
Thats us doing our job.
Yes, and your very bad at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Necroits Empires
item.dc:creator: @NizuraInaka NizuraInaka
item.description:
@NizuraInaka wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:29, topic:404735”]Honestly, if you can receive honest feedback from an ex-player because of your apparently horrible staff, then you don’t need to be administrating a server to begin with. Your little “patches” you do, completely retarded. A few plugins, sure. But a shit load that you have. Fuck that.

Also, the reason why he’s talking about it here instead of your website is because he saw it here first. Dumb ass.[/quote]

I dont understand what you are saying. Or maybe i do.
If I, the only one who has access to the IP’s, who writes down all ip’s that he bans along with the IGN in a book, doesnt remember this, and by “doesnt remember this” i mean “knows this didnt happen”, then it didnt happen.
I conclude that either
A: he is either using the same computer of the person who got banned
B: a person who actually got banned and is just trollin the forum.
C: a person who never even logged on the server.

Because if his IP was banned… how can he ask the admin what happened if he wasnt IN GAME.

If if for some reason the he somehow talked to an “ADMIN who later claim that he wasnt staff”… that means that a normal player said he was an ADMIN which he never really was.

That’s not my or the staff fault that someone else lied.

But he doesnt say he was IP banned, he was regular banned. So even if… His name was probably inappropriate and a staff member actually did ban the name.

Either way… being banned means that you did something that deserved the result of you being expelled permanently from the server. That isnt us being abusive. Thats us doing our job.

Read full topic

item.title: Necroits Empires
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“NizuraInaka, post:26, topic:404735”]hat trix, you are one of the rare people i see on the internet with an IQ over 2.

He just mad cause he’s banned. He cant judge the server cause he basically never played it as well. And the staff is untrustworthy? I am the staff. You didnt tell me ANYTHING. And the only people i banned i have written down in a book. And when i ban, i ban by the IP’s. For you to be IP banned, which means that you had to do something that actually required me to go to the console… look for your IGN, look for the matching IP, and actually ban it.

Other than that, your name was probably banned from our anti-spam.

In either way, if you were banned, you deserved it.

And you even talking about this, HERE, instead of putting a post at OUR website, is why I called you a troll.

Troll: a troll is someone who posts inflammatory,[2] extraneous, or off-topic messages in an online community, such as an online discussion forum, chat room, or blog, with the primary intent of provoking readers into an emotional response[3] or of otherwise disrupting normal on-topic discussion.

Source: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Troll_(Internet)[/quote]

edit: llmfao, take back what u said! my iq is less then 2
